Head css style
format:
<style>
#tl {
    width: 120px;
    border: 1px solid black;
    overflow: hidden;
    background-color: black;
    padding: 10px;
}

#tl_small {
    width: 60px;
    border: 1px solid black;
    overflow: hidden;
    background-color: black;
    padding: 10px;
}

#redLight {
    border-radius: 25px;
    background-color: red;
    margin: 10px;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
}

#redLightBorder {
    border-radius: 23px;
    border: 2px solid red;
    margin: 10px;
    width: 46px;
    height: 46px;
    overflow: hidden;
}

#yellowLight {
    border-radius: 25px;
    background-color: yellow;
    margin: 10px;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
}

#yellowLightBorder {
    border-radius: 23px;
    border: 2px solid yellow;
    margin: 10px;
    width: 46px;
    height: 46px;
    overflow: hidden;
}

#greenLight {
    border-radius: 25px;
    background-color: green;
    margin: 10px;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    overflow: hidden;
}

#greenLightBorder {
    border-radius: 23px;
    border: 2px solid green;
    margin: 10px;
    width: 46px;
    height: 46px;
    overflow: hidden;
}

#redLightLeft {
    border: solid red;
    border-width: 0 11px 11px 0;
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 0px;
    margin: 10px;
    transform: rotate(135deg);
    -webkit-transform: rotate(135deg);
    height: 26px;
    width: 26px;
    float: left;
}

#redLightLeftBorder {
    border: solid red;
    border-width: 0 2px 2px 0;
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 0px;
    margin: 10px;
    transform: rotate(135deg);
    -webkit-transform: rotate(135deg);
    height: 34px;
    width: 34px;
    float: left;
}

#yellowLightLeft {
    border: solid yellow;
    border-width: 0 11px 11px 0;
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 0px;
    margin: 10px;
    transform: rotate(135deg);
    -webkit-transform: rotate(135deg);
    height: 26px;
    width: 26px;
    float: left;
}

#yellowLightLeftBorder {
    border: solid yellow;
    border-width: 0 2px 2px 0;
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 0px;
    margin: 10px;
    transform: rotate(135deg);
    -webkit-transform: rotate(135deg);
    height: 34px;
    width: 34px;
    float: left;
}

#greenLightLeft {
    border: solid green;
    border-width: 0 11px 11px 0;
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 0px;
    margin: 10px;
    transform: rotate(135deg);
    -webkit-transform: rotate(135deg);
    height: 26px;
    width: 26px;
    float: left;
}

#greenLightLeftBorder {
    border: solid green;
    border-width: 0 2px 2px 0;
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 0px;
    margin: 10px;
    transform: rotate(135deg);
    -webkit-transform: rotate(135deg);
    height: 34px;
    width: 34px;
    float: left;
}
</style>
